Dialogue.Value: Gather ’round， UnderNet!,Let’s share info the surface,users can’t handle!
Usernames are banned，,so you can post whatever,you want anonymously!
I found a Dark Chip smuggler,hiding in the UnderNet earlier.
You guys should try finding,him. lelelelel,It’ll be tough. lelelel
( ´ ･ω ･ ) んも〜, / ｏ={=}ｏ '´ﾊﾞﾘﾊﾞﾘﾊﾞﾘ,､､しー-Ｊミ(.@)ｗｗｗｗ
Dark Chips， huh? They’re,useful， but only bad guys,can use them without any
huge drawbacks.,Recently， I saw some blonde,Navi walking around in a
dark arua， like the one that,comes from using Dark Chips.
”arua” should be ”aura”
Quit trolling， guys lel,At least give some good info,lel
If you thought about buying a,second Virus Ball， the seller’s,gone.
Seriously? I was gonna,buy another one since I,caught so many viruses.
That reminds me， I want to,increase my virus’s attack,power.
How do you get Error Frags?
Error Frags， huh?,Try countering Heat， Elec，,or Earth viruses.
Only Aqua and Leaf viruses,give Freeze Frags. Farm,Kedama for Bug Frags.
Firing a ChainGun into swarms,of LibeRadar viruses gives,lotsa Bug Frags! ( ﾟ д ﾟ )ｳﾏｰ
You can also get Bug Frags,by countering your friends’,custom Navis.
If you’re fighting a Navi， you,can get 10 Bug Frags at once.
Use the Bug Frags to increase,the power of your homegrown,viruses.
Seems like there’s a ROM,Navi on the run on the surface.
I couldn’t go outside with all,the Net Agents runnin’ around.,( ´ ･ω ･｀)
What have the NetFuzz done,to put you on edge? lel
I think that ROM Navi is a,decoy. It’s tryin’ to distract,the NetFuzz by runnin’
from place to place so ROM,can cause trouble somewhere,else.
You poke fun at the NetFuzz，,but they’re really amazing.
Especially that Yorihime chick!,She’s incredibly strong!
She dodged my folder’s,strongest P.A.， HiCannon，,and went on the attack!
If I didn’t have RunSoul,installed， I’d be nothin’ but,Bug Frags!
Thinking HighCannon is,strong lelelelel
Also， assuming you’d drop,Bug Frags when you’re,countered lelel
Hey， you guys know anything,about a dragon virus?
I ran into one before.,It had a lot of HP and its,attacks were huge!
I had to run away!,Tell me what kinds of chips are,good against it!
Is it a Juragon?,I was definitely nervous the,first time I saw one.
Its large body is its weakness.
Just release some long attacks,that hit its whole body. lel
Aha! Hakkero and Wave,chips do the trick! Thanks!
Whenever I see the dragon,virus， it reminds me of,Cybeasts.
Virus hunters suppressed,some adolescent Cybeasts,just the other day.
Cybeasts appeared? lel,Seriously? Wish I coulda,seen it. lelel
A Cybeast forms when,tons of bug and error frags,accumulate， right?
They’re dangerous as adults，,but fights between Cybeasts,and hunters are interestin’〜!
Sorry I’m such a slowpoke，,but what’s a virus hunter?
You don’t know what a virus,hunter is? You a noob?,Nothin’ personal.
Virus hunters are teams of,pros who hunt viruses for a,living.
Remember those SP Virus,Missions? Guess that’s how,they get by.
Cybeasts are kinda like,viruses， so virus hunters have,to deal with them too.
>Cybeasts are kinda like,>viruses,So you can catch them?
You can’t catch them. lelel,Just ’cuz you say it’s a virus,doesn’t mean it is. lelel
Just because it moves like it’s,alive doesn’t mean it is.
Even a robot made of circuits,can move like it’s alive.
It’s not actually alive， y’know?
And do you even know how,big an adult Cybeast is?
At 10 feet tall and 17 feet wide，,it’s a monster. lelelel
My buddy’s been naggin’ me,about Dark Chips recently.
His Navi was a ”kid’s model”，,the type with low capacity，and,he liked usin’ Dark Chips.
One day it just rampaged and,turned into a huge monster.,What gives?
It’s a DarkRoid now，that Navi’s,done，dude.
Low-cap Navis don’t have much,to ’em，so Dark Chips start,overwritin’ their Navi-bits.
Each Dark Chip has a bit of,data that it forces inta ya when,you use it.
Unless you’re already,committed to evil，watch your,Dark Chip use.
They’ve been deleted，but,there used to be a real beast,of a Navi roaming the Net.
They only had a Max HP of 1，,but it seemed all those points,went into battle performance.
It was like they had two full sets,of attack and utility AddOns.
Idiot got himself deleted by,stepping on a poison panel.,lel
I was there for that.,lelel,Talk of the board，that guy.
Rumor had it that guy,mucked with his own code.,lel
Some guy’s made an AddOn,based on that guy. Now you,can be a 1 HP wonder too.
A 1 HP AddOn?,fuggggg :DDDDDDD
Is it called HP1? I need another,joke AddOn to go with my,peashooter buster. lel
It might not be a joke if your,NetOp is good enough to,dodge every attack.
It’s not impossible，but there’s,no way I could pull that off.,lel
I was taking a walk in the upper,Net and some black Navi came,up to me.
They offered me a Dark Chip if I,could beat some tough viruses.
How do you deal with viruses,with more than 300 HP?,I’m gonna take that challenge.
I like to take out the rest of the,viruses first so they don’t mess,with me.
Then you can crush the big guy,with your best chips.
Kekeke，I learned this strat,from a FalLeafEx5，and I’ve,used it a few times since.
Plop down a metal cube in front,of them and they have no idea,what to do.
I really need to delete this,freakin’ virus.
I watched a buddy on a hunt,three times，but I still have no,idea how to beat TanukitSP.
You can hit the TanukitSP by,shooting the real Jizo statue,and avoiding the fakes.
If you look carefully，the real,statue will be standing on the,panel a bit differently.
If you mess up，you’re out of,luck. Instant 1000 damage of,lightning to your face.
It’s time....
I just followed along for a,5th hunt，but now it’s my turn to,track down that raccoon boy.
Don’t get deleted before you,find that racoon....,lelelel
There’s something in the air,freaking out the Upper Net.
You heard about a black Navi,that came up from the Deep?,Messed up a few topsiders.
”The black Navi’s too hard，,waaaaahhh”.
I’d like to see it survive my,10000 damage combo.,Bang，bang!
Wow!!,You just beat the black Navi!!
All you have to do is keep,shooting，it’s just that simple.
The Deep Undernet....,It’s not like this end of the,Undernet with you thugs.
Sometimes I go down to fight,tough viruses，but lately there’s,been some weird activity.
Yeah，I saw some blonde girl,Navi in the back of the Deep,Undernet.
I wonder what they were up to?
That’s the girl taking down ROM,operations.
I want to date a girl who can,beat me up.,lel
She’s mine，I saw her first!,lelelel
Did you see that ROM declared,war? Things are lookin’ up.
Now’s not the time to be edgy.
This is a bad thing for the Net.
>net agent bad,>ROM man good,It’s that time of year again....
I think it’s time for a SP virus,hunt thread!,First up， RaijunSP!
>RaijunSP,Just gotta dodge up and down,to the beat，yeah.
But that AxeHawkSP....,How do you know where that,axe’s goin’ next?
>AxeHawkSP,Try blocking it with a sandbag,or somethin’.
That Beetl SP tho....,How are we supposed to bust,through 400 aura?
400 aura’s nothin’ if you can,nail a 200 damage Heat shot,on a grass panel.
After that，their next aura’s,gonna break from a stiff breeze.
I was out playin’ in Undernet 10，,but I think I saw the ghost of a,Navi I used to know!
I’m scared!!,I’m not going outside anymore!!
Ghost viruses，ghost Navis，,pffft.,Quit bein’ such a baby.
I’m pretty sure there’s a door,to Heaven somewhere in the,Undernet.
God only knows if that rumor’s,true，though.
Heaven....,Is that the big staircase in the,back of Undernet 7?
It goes so high that I can’t see,the top.
It’s probably just a dead-end....
Why don’t you just ask one of,those ghosts?,lel
>Heaven,Nobody’s talking about Hell?
You know Undernet 9，where,the BugFrag trader is?
Somewhere in Undernet 9,is a pathway to Hell.
I heard you’ll know where it,is when you see a female Navi,hanging about.
Been saving up my Bugfrags,for a trip down to Undernet 9,anyways.
A female Navi hangin’ around,the place?,Mmmmm....
She’s strong，tho.
Ages ago I heard she went up,against the toughest boys in,the Undernet. They ran cryin’!
Women are scary!
The only way to win，is not,to play!
I heard that Navi’s NetOp is,some bored housewife....
Ara ara me，mommy!,lelelel
